name: Heka Digital Technologies LTD
description: Heka is a telemedicine startup that aims to remove barriers to accessing healthcare, reduce the overrall cost of care and have 24/7 real time surveillance on people with chronic non-communicable diseases using artificial intelligence

SDGs.evidenceText: Non-communicable diseases account for 71% of all deaths globally and 15 million people die yearly from non-communicable diseases and 85% of these deaths occur in low and middle income countries. Heka AI powered remote-patient monitoring system will lower deaths and complications using AI predicitive analysis for early detection of warning signs for early intervention in people with non-communicable diseases
